Linux on Everything

Reading slashdot one will often see comments of the 'yes, but does it run linux?' ilk whenever any new product or application is mentioned. This is due to the masochistic nature of some linux hackers (known as the "linux on everything" movement) who see the need to get linux to run on just about anything with a power cable from x-boxs, and ipods to fridges and toasters and in some cases even things without a processor :)

I give to you the HOWTO: Installing Linux on a Dead Badger
